revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=KOHO |model=KP100 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=03/18/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=pico video projector |fcc_id=AZQKP100 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=A20 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=H27UBG8T2BTR-BC |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G63CFR-H9C |ram1_num=4 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=microSD, USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=soldered to main board |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188EUS |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags=battery, fan |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;;Android; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} "KP100_MB_V2.0", "WWW.KOHOTECH.COM", and "VER 2.0" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :The fan shown is a '''SEPA''' HY45T-05.
Per the FCC manual, the resolution of this device is '''854 x 480''' (WVGA).
==Probable used PSU(s)== The FCC test report indicates the used power supply is a '''Shenzhen Fujia Appliance''' FJ-SW1201500N.
